constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 20 (Wednesday, February 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KUSTER:
H.R. 763.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution, the Taxing and Spending Clause: ``The Congress
shall have Power To lay and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts
and Excises, to pay the Debts and provide for the common
Defense and general Welfare of the United States . . .''
[Page H325]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: Child and Animal Abuse Detection and Reporting Act
